text: Jassim Mohammed (born 10 June 1984 in Nasiriyah, Iraq) is an Iraqi footballer who plays as a striker for Al-Shorta in the Iraq Premier League, as well as the Iraq national team. ==International career== On 24 July 2016, Jassim made his first international cap with Iraq against Uzbekistan in a friendly match. === Iraq national team goals === :Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! title: Jassim Mohammed
